SELECT SUM(SEND_CNT) AS GNR_SEND_CNT, SUM(READ_CNT) AS GNR_READ_CNT, SUM(REV_CNT) AS GNR_RECV_CNT, SUM(FAIL_CNT) AS GNR_FAIL_CNT FROM T_PUSH_MSG_RECV_MASTER WHERE RESERVEDATE BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102)
AND SENDERID=#{SENDERID}
SELECT * FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) AS GNR_TOT_CNT FROM T_PUSH_RESERVE_MSG WHERE PROCESS_FLAG = 'Y' )AS A, ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS GNR_FAIL_CNT FROM T_PUSH_RESERVE_MSG WHERE PROCESS_FLAG = 'F' )AS B

SELECT CONVERT(char(10), T1.REGDATE, 102) DT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO T1 WHERE T1.REGDATE BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102) GROUP BY CONVERT(char(10), T1.REGDATE, 102) ORDER BY CONVERT(char(10), T1.REGDATE, 102) ASC

SELECT SUM(SENT_CNT) AS GNR_TOT_CNT, SUM(UPNS_SENT_CNT) AS UPNS_SENT_CNT, SUM(APNS_SENT_CNT) AS APNS_SENT_CNT, SUM(GCM_SENT_CNT) AS GCM_SENT_CNT FROM T_PUSH_SYSMSG_SENTINFO WHERE CONVERT(datetime, SENDDATE) BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102)
SELECT TOP 3 APP_IDX, APP_NM, REG_DTTM FROM TB_STO_APP

SELECT A.*, D.APP_NM FROM( SELECT TOP 3 BIN_NO, EMP_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_STO_DL WHERE REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102) GROUP BY BIN_NO, EMP_NO ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO_USER AS B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO_AUTH AS C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO_APP AS D ON C.APP_IDX = D.APP_IDX
SELECT TOP 6 BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TITLE, REG_DT FROM TB_STO_BOARD

SELECT A.*, B.SVC_NM FROM( SELECT TOP 3 A.DPLY_IDX, A.DPLY_NM, A.DPLY_VER, A.REG_DTTM, A.DPLY_DESC, A.SVC_ID FROM TB_MOB_DPLY AS A INNER JOIN( SELECT A.SVC_ID FROM TB_SVC_AUTH A, TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP B, TB_MOB_SVC C WHERE A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{S_ID_USER,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SVC_ID = C.SVC_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS B ON A.SVC_ID = A.SVC_ID ORDER BY A.DPLY_IDX DESC )AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVC AS B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID

SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) AS DT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_MOB_EVENT_LOG T1 WHERE T1.REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102)
GROUP BY CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) ORDER BY CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) ASC

SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) AS DT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_MOB_EVENT_LOG T1 WHERE T1.REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime,#{FROM_DATE}, 102) AND CONVERT(datetime,#{TO_DATE}, 102) AND T1.COMP_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) ORDER BY CONVERT(CHAR(10), T1.REG_DTTM, 102) ASC
